author: Joe Mcdonald
title: China's economy in worst downturn since '70s in virus battle - The Associated Press
description: China's economy in worst downturn since '70s in virus battle The Associated Press China’s G.D.P. Shrank in the First Quarter: Live Updates The New York Times China to release GDP figures as small businesses hurt most Al Jazeera English It’s the End of the Wor…
content:
BEIJING (AP) China suffered its worst economic contraction since at least the 1970s in the first quarter as it fought the coronavirus, and weak consumer spending and factory activity point to a longer, harder recovery than initially expected.
